Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உறுப்பொத்தல் மக்களொப்பு அன்றால் வெறுத்தக்கபண்பொத்தல் ஒப்பதாம் ஒப்பு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Men are not one because their members seem alike to outward view; Similitude of kindred quality makes likeness true.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A group of people who look physically similar ('Uruppothal') stand together, but they are depicted as hollow, clay-like figures, emphasizing their superficial similarity.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Among them, two individuals stand out. They may look physically different, but they are connected by a radiant light flowing between their hearts. This light represents their shared noble character ('Panpothal').
Layered_Composition.Background: A neutral, abstract background that forces the viewer to focus on the contrast between physical and spiritual resemblance.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual argument that true human likeness ('Oppu') comes not from shared physical form but from a shared resonance of good character.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The hollow, clay-like figures for physical similarity. The glowing light connecting the hearts for similarity of character is the central, powerful symbol.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Profound, insightful, spiritual, looking beyond the superficial.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The clay figures are in muted, monochromatic grays. The two individuals with shared character are vividly colored, illuminated by the bright, warm light connecting them.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Medium wide shot, focusing on the two connected figures as the clear subjects, with the others as background context.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, symbolic realism, with a mix of realistic human figures and stylized clay forms.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High contrast, with the light from the hearts being the primary source of illumination and color in the scene.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Surrealist or symbolic art, using visual metaphors to convey a deep philosophical idea.

Negative_Prompt: all figures looking identical in spirit, no glowing light, realistic background, text artifacts, cartoonish, blurry.
